definitions.definition: To render insensate or kill (an animal , especially cattle or a laboratory animal) by cutting , piercing , or otherwise destroying the spinal cord .
To extract the pith from (something or ( figurative ) someone).

main_definition: To render insensate or kill (an animal , especially cattle or a laboratory animal) by cutting , piercing , or otherwise destroying the spinal cord . [from early 19th c.]
secondary_definitions: To extract the pith from (something or ( figurative ) someone).
